description: This file defines the RoomsService class for fetching room data from an API and the Room class representing room entities. It handles API calls, JSON parsing, and data modeling related to rooms in a Flutter application.

classes.name: RoomsService
classes.description: Singleton class providing access to room data via API calls.

classes.name: Room
classes.description: Data class representing a room entity with JSON deserialization.

methods.name: getRooms
methods.description: Asynchronous method that fetches a list of rooms from the API and parses the JSON response.

methods.name: Room.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Room instance from JSON data.
